games.title: The Division 2
games.description: A 3rd person military tactical shooter set in a destroyed Washington DC where you fight off various factions from taking over the city.

games.title: No Man's Sky
games.description: A survival space adventure where the players explores and colonizes planets in endless solar systems in the Milky Way Galaxy.

games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: A RPG which the player plays as V in a cyberpunk setting doing missions in Night City.

games.title: Mafia: Definitive Edition
games.description: A crime action game where you play as a taxi driver turned mafia hitman.
